homepage.presentation: I am a front-end developer interested in everything that orbits the scientific and IT world. I am working in retail projects of different brands, from luxury and fashion to beauty and cosmetics.
homepage.description: I maintain and implement front end web solutions and architectures, through the writing of optimal algorithms and clean code, to guarantee the website functionalities. I take care of the website performance and web accessibility. I had a strong interest on the Generative AI on which I keep myself updated to learn new technologies.

footer.siteInfo: Sviluppato con Visual Studio Code. Costruito con Next.js e Tailwind CSS, distribuito con Vercel.
